channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: The Gulf of Whatnow? Mapmakers grapple with Trump’s geographic renaming plans
item.description: Mapmakers and teachers are re-thinking what to call the gulf of water between Mexico, the United States and Cuba after President Donald Trump ordered it renamed from the Gulf of Mexico to the Gulf of America.

item.title: Firefighters battle to maintain the upper hand on a huge fire north of Los Angeles
Cracks emerge in House GOP after speaker’s threat to saddle California wildfire aid with conditions
